trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: 提供有关数据<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging"></xref>事件。

trans-unit.source: You can use the data from the InputLanguageChangingEventArgs class to prepare to change Input Method Editors (IME) or swap right-to-left values.
trans-unit.target: 可以使用 InputLanguageChangingEventArgs 类中的数据准备来更改输入法编辑器 (IME) 文件或交换右到左值。

trans-unit.source: You can also change a thread's <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A> and <xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> properties so that different resources get picked up.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以更改线程的<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>和<xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A>属性以便不同的资源获取选取相符。</xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentUICulture%2A> </xref:System.Threading.Thread.CurrentCulture%2A>

trans-unit.source: To prevent the input language from changing, set the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: 若要阻止的输入的语言更改，将设置<xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>属性`true`。</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>

trans-unit.source: An InputLanguageChangingEventArgs identifies the requested input language and the character set of new input language.
trans-unit.target: InputLanguageChangingEventArgs 标识请求的输入的语言和新的输入语言的字符集。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs.Culture%2A> property identifies the locale of the requested language.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs.Culture%2A>属性标识请求的语言的区域设置。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs.Culture%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging> event precedes the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging>事件之前<xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged>事件。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanged> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.Form.InputLanguageChanging>

trans-unit.source: For information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关处理事件的信息，请参阅[事件](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified locale, character set, and acceptance.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"></xref>在指定的区域设置、 字符集和接受的类。

trans-unit.source: The locale of the requested input language.
trans-unit.target: 请求的输入语言的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system default font supports the character set required for the requested input language; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果系统默认字体支持请求的输入语言; 所要求的字符集否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"></xref> class with the specified input language, character set, and acceptance of a language change.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangingEventArgs"></xref>指定的输入的语言、 与字符集，接受语言更改的类。

trans-unit.source: The requested input language.
trans-unit.target: 请求的输入的语言。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system default font supports the character set required for the requested input language; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果系统默认字体支持请求的输入语言; 所要求的字符集否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: inputLanguage is .
trans-unit.target: inputLanguageis .

trans-unit.source: Gets the locale of the requested input language.
trans-unit.target: 获取请求的输入语言的区域设置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs.Culture%2A> property specifies a <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that defines a set of user preference information dependent on the user's language, sublanguage, country/region, and cultural conventions.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs.Culture%2A>属性指定<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，它定义一组的用户首选项信息依赖于用户的语言、 子语言、 国家/地区和区域性的约定。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.InputLanguageChangedEventArgs.Culture%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> that specifies the locale of the requested input language.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>，它指定请求的输入语言的区域设置。</xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating the input language.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值的输入的语言。

trans-unit.source: The input language.
trans-unit.target: 输入的语言。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the system default font supports the character set required for the requested input language.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示系统默认字体是否支持请求的输入语言所要求的字符集。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the system default font supports the character set required for the requested input language; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果系统默认字体支持请求的输入语言; 所要求的字符集否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
